name: Avoid Programs with more than X LoC and no Subroutines  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches all the programs having more than X LoC and no subroutines.
output:
This report lists RPG300 programs with more than X LoC and no Subroutines. X is parameter value.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Program full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there the programs are not having more than X lines of code and no Subroutines. This kind of code will be very difficult to read.
remediation: Review the source code in order to have programs with less than X lines of code and have the code in the subroutines.
alternativeName: Avoid Programs with more than X LoC and no Subroutines  (RPG300)
